Misunderstandings cause fights, and fights I don't want, and thus 
misunderstandings must be cleared up.

Soulstice, this was uncalled for. Equally uncalled for, was Hottie's 
message. Many things that were said were incorrect, and I find it 
really silly to start a flame war or anything else over an stupid 
OOC arguement. It's not like WW3 is going to start because (for 
example) G1 bots are taller than BW bots... 

I want both of you to send private letters of apology to each other, 
with my email address in the CC box. They don't have to be 
elaborate, just a simple apology.

Anyone who says they won't apologize had better have a very long 
private email for me explaining why. It had better be good...
